name: Baby's First Christmas Custom Ornament with Photo and Birth Stats
description:
This ceramic ornament is commemorates baby's first Christmas with a photo and birth stats that you provide. This ornament is handmade with care and can be handed down for years to come.

You can customize the text however you want: birth stats or simply Baby's First Christmas. You may send the photo and personalization information to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com upon checkout. A decal will be made and fired onto the ornament. It will be permanent and can be handed down for years to come.

Please allow up to two weeks for your ornament to be made and fired.

I will only alter photos for size and contrast, so it will appear pretty much the way you send it. The image will be sepia toned and will be cropped to fit a 2.5" circle or oval (depending on the photo you send).

The ornament is 3" in diameter and 1" thick.

Each ornament will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper and may be shipped directly to the recipient with a gift note at no extra cost.

*This process can also be used for other photos, scanned images of handwritten notes or children's artwork. Feel free to contact me with any questions!

name: Pet Portrait Ornament
description:
This ceramic ornament is handmade from a photo of your pet and would make a lovely gift this holiday season.

You can customize the text however you want: name, quote, year, etc. You can send the photo and personalization information to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com upon checkout. A decal will be made and fired onto the ornament. It will be permanent and can be handed down for years to come.

Please allow up to two weeks for your ornament to be made and fired.

I will only alter photos for size and contrast, so it will appear pretty much the way you send it. The image will be sepia toned and will be cropped to fit a 2.5" circle or oval (depending on the photo you send).

The ornament is 3" in diameter and 1" thick.

Each ornament will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper and may be shipped directly to the recipient with a gift note at no extra cost.

*This process can also be used for other photos, scanned images of handwritten notes or children's artwork. Feel free to contact me with any questions!

name: Custom Photo Ornament
description:
This ceramic ornament is handmade from one of your treasured photographs and would make a lovely gift this holiday season.

You can customize the text however you want: names, quote, year, etc. Email us a photo with the personalization information at Ruthie@artsmithshop.com . A decal is made and fired onto the ornament. It will be permanent and can be handed down for years to come.

Please allow up to two weeks for your ornament to be made and fired. 

I will only alter photos for size and contrast, so it will appear pretty much the way you send it. The image will be sepia toned and will be cropped to fit a 2.5" circle. 

The ornament is 3" in diameter and 1" thick. 

Each ornament will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper and may be shipped directly to the recipient with a gift note at no extra cost.

*This process can be used for any photos or scanned images of handwritten notes or children's artwork. Just email us with any questions!

name: Custom House Ornament
description:
This ceramic ornament is handmade from a photo of your home and would make a lovely gift this holiday season.

You can customize the text however you want: family name, quote, year, etc. Email us a photo with the personalization information at Ruthie@artsmithshop.com . A decal is made and fired onto the ornament. It will be permanent and can be handed down for years to come.

Please allow up to two weeks for your ornament to be made and fired. 

I will only alter photos for size and contrast, so it will appear pretty much the way you send it. The image will be sepia toned and will be cropped to fit a 2.5" circle. 

The ornament is 3" in diameter and 1" thick. 

Each ornament will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper and may be shipped directly to the recipient with a gift note at no extra cost.

*This process can also be used for other photos or scanned images of handwritten notes or children's artwork. Just email us with any questions!

name: Custom Wedding Platter Thank You Platter
description:
A personalized platter is a lovely way for a bride & groom to say thank you to their parents or bridal party. This design features a tree with two love birds. It may be personalized with your own words, names & date. This design can also be used as a wedding gift for the happy couple, omitting the "thank you."

Please include any personalization information in the "notes to seller" section upon checkout or email ruthie@artsmithshop.com .

Please allow up to 2 weeks for painting and firing. 

This platter is 15x8"
food/oven safe
hand-washing recommended

The platter will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper. I can also ship directly to the recipient and include a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

name: Custom Recipe Platter with Photo
description:
This Custom Recipe Plate is a wonderful way to preserve a piece of family history.

I can transfer your recipes & photos onto a plate or platter that can be treasured for years to come.

Scan the photo & recipe and email me the files. I will adjust for size and contrast, but the image will remain the same. I will create a custom decal of your image and fire it onto the pottery. The plate will be glazed and fired twice and the resulting image will be sepia toned (brownish-black). Your pottery will be oven & food safe. I recommend handwashing.

This plate is 15x8"

If you want multiple plates using the same recipe contact me for pricing. Please feel free to contact me with any questions. Ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Oval or Rectangular Monogram Platter
description:
A Personalized platter is a lovely gift for newlyweds or for couples celebrating a special anniversary. This is a rectangular platter featuring the couple's monogram & date/year. 

You can also include a short personal note for the backside (ex. "Wishing you a lifetime of love and laughter. Love, The Smiths). The color will be sepia tone (brownish black).

Please include this information in the notes to seller section upon checkout or email it to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com :
1. Initials (Bride, Last, Groom OR B&G)
2. date or year (9.10.13 OR 2013)
3. Personal note for backside (optional)
4. The date you need this item by if applicable

Please allow up to 2 weeks for painting and firing. 

Rectangular platter is 15x8"
Oval platter is 12x8"
food/oven safe
hand-washing recommended

The platter will be wrapped in decorative tissue paper. I can also ship directly to the recipient and include a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

name: Custom Monogram Utensil Holder / Vase
description:
A custom utensil holder is a great gift for newlyweds, for a housewarming, or host/hostess gift. It also works great as a vase.

The text is sepia toned. Please include the initials in the notes to seller section upon checkout or send the information to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com. You may also add a short personal message to the bottom (ex. Love, the Smith Family). Include a "need by" date if applicable.

Please allow up to two weeks for painting and firing.

This item is 6 1/2" tall x 4 1/2" across.

Each item is gift wrapped in decorative tissue paper. If needed, I can ship directly to the recipient with a card and personal message from you at no extra cost.

name: Wine Stopper with Poem
description:
This hand made ceramic bottle stopper is perfect for the wine lover in your life.

It features a quote from a poem by Omar Khayyam

"A book of verses underneath the bough, a jug of wine, a loaf of bread, and thou"

This stopper comes in a pretty organza gift bag which is perfect for hanging on the neck of a bottle. 

Bottle stoppers typically ship in 1-2 business days.

name: Custom Square Platter With Wavy Edge
description:
This is a lovely personalized gift for a wedding, housewarming or special anniversary.

This square server can be customized with the names & date of the couple's wedding. Date can be omitted as well. The text will be sepia toned (brownish-black in color) on a white background. A short personal note may be added to the backside ( ex. Wishing you a lifetime of love and laughter. Love the Smith Family)

Platter is 11.25x11.25"
food & oven safe 
Handwashing is recommended

This item can shipped directly to the recipient, wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

You can provide the information upon checkout or via email at ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom Square Server
description:
This is a lovely personalized gift for a wedding, housewarming or special anniversary.

A short personal note may be added to the backside ( ex. Wishing you a lifetime of love and laughter. Love the Smith Family)

Server Dish is 10.25x10.25"
food & oven safe

This item can shipped directly to the recipient, wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

You can provide the information upon checkout or via email at ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom Oval Anniversary/Wedding Platter
description:
This is a lovely personalized gift for a wedding or special anniversary. 

This platter can be customized with the names & date of the couple's wedding. You may change the wording according to your preference. The text will be sepia toned (brownish-black in color) on a white background. A short personal note may be added to the backside ( ex. Happy 25th Anniversary. Love the Smith Family). 

Platter is 12x8" 
food & oven safe 
Handwashing is recommended
 
This item can shipped directly to the recipient, wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

You can provide the information upon checkout or via email  ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom House Platter
description:
Are you looking for a unique housewarming, wedding or anniversary gift? This hand painted ceramic platter is the perfect gift  and keepsake for a friend or for yourself.

Please email a good quality photo to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com. The depiction will be done as a black and white line drawing. 

The platter size is 16"x11"

Platters are oven safe & food safe. Hand washing is recommended. Please allow up to two weeks for painting & firing. 

Platters are wrapped carefully with tissue paper and bubble wrap and may be mailed directly to the recipient with a gift note from you.

name: Custom Family Recipe Platter
description:
This Custom Recipe Plate is a wonderful way to preserve a piece of family history.

I can transfer your handwritten recipes or special handwritten notes onto a plate or platter that can be treasured for years to come.

Scan the recipe and email me the file. I will adjust for size and contrast, but the image will remain the same. I will create a custom decal of your image and fire it onto the pottery. The plate will be glazed and fired twice and the resulting image will be sepia toned (brownish-black). Your pottery will be oven & food safe. I recommend handwashing.

This plate is 15x8" 

If you want multiple plates using the same recipe contact me for pricing. Please feel free to contact me with any questions. Ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom Wedding Platter
description:
This is a lovely personalized gift for a wedding or special anniversary. 

This platter can be customized with the names & date of the couple's wedding and will be fired twice. The text will be sepia toned (brownish-black in color) on a white background. A short personal note may be added to the backside ( ex. Wishing you a lifetime of happiness. Love the Smith Family). 

Platter is 15x8" 
food & oven safe 
Handwashing is recommended
 
This item can shipped directly to the recipient, wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

You can provide the information upon checkout or via email  ruthie@artsmithshop.com 

1. names 
2. date in the format you want it depicted (numerical or written out)
3. Personal note for backside (optional)
4. The date you need this item by if applicable

name: Custom Family Recipe Plate
description:
This Custom Recipe Plate is a wonderful way to preserve a piece of family history.
 
Is there a recipe that you and your grandmother used to make together when you were a child? Is there a family recipe that was brought from the old country and passed down through generations?

I can transfer your handwritten recipes or special handwritten notes onto a plate or platter that can be treasured for years to come. 

Scan the recipe in and email me the file. I will adjust for size and contrast, but the image will remain the same.  I will create a custom decal of your image and fire it onto the pottery. The plate will be glazed and fired twice and the resulting image will be sepia toned. Your pottery will be oven & food safe, but I recommend handwashing.

This plate is 12" in diameter. Other sizes available upon request. 

If you want multiple plates using the same recipe contact me for pricing. Please feel free to contact me with any questions. Ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom State Outline Platter with Heart on Town
description:
A state outline platter is a lovely gift for many occasions and can be personalized to make it extra special.

This hand painted ceramic platter features the outline of any state and can be customized with a small heart in the location of a certain town or with a short phrase on either the front or backside.

Leave any custom details, including the state and town if applicable, in the Notes to Seller section upon checkout.

Platter is 12"x8", oven safe and food safe. This handmade platter is both functional and beautiful. Display it on a plate hanger or use it for serving.

Please allow up to 2 weeks for painting and firing.

name: Slainte Custom Irish Bottle Stopper
description:
This hand made cermic bottle stopper is perfect for a whiskey or wine lover or for St Patrick's Day celebrations.
It features "Slainte" (cheers) and a dark green shamrock.
This stopper comes in a pretty organza gift bag which is perfect for hanging on the neck of a bottle.
Bottle stoppers typically ship in 1-2 business days.

name: Custom Wedding / Anniversary / Engagement Platter Tree with Leaves
description:
This custom platter features a tree design with a heart including the couple's initials and wedding date. If this is an engagement platter, the wedding date may be omitted. You may choose autumn or green leaves.
Each platter is handpainted and one of a kind. A short personal message can be added to the backside. (ex. Wishing you a lifetime of happiness. love, Kate & John)
 
Platter is 15x8" 
food & oven safe 
Handwashing is recommended

This item can shipped directly to the recipient, wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card and message from you at no extra cost.

name: Mommy's Bottle Wine Stopper
description:
This is the perfect gift for any new or veteran mom who likes to unwind with a glass from "mommy's bottle."

This hand painted ceramic wine stopper features the phrase "Mommy's Bottle" and the image of a wine glass. All stoppers include a pretty, organza bag for gift giving.

This item is ready to ship.

name: Custom Monogram Platter
description:
This custom monogram platter is a lovely gift for newlyweds or those celebrating a special anniversary. 

Please specify colors, initials & date. A short personal note may be added to the backside at no extra charge. You can email the details & any questions to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com 

Platter is hand painted, food & oven safe. Handwashing is recommended.

Platter is 12"x8"

This item can be shipped directly to the recipient wrapped in decorative tissue paper with a gift card & message from you at no additional cost.

name: Custom Ceramic Wine Stopper Personalized
description:
A custom wine stopper is the perfect gift for a host/hostess or any wine lover.

Add a family name or individual's name.

Each wine stopper is hand painted with glaze & fired in a kiln. Each stopper is one of a kind.

name: Custom Pet Portrait Charcoal Drawing 8x10"
description:
A custom pet portrait is a wonderful way to honor the love of a pet or to memorialize the ones that left us too soon.

Each drawing is custom made and one of a kind.

Please provide a good quality digital photo to work from upon purchase. This can be emailed to Ruthie@artsmithshop.com.

This drawing is 8x10" and includes a white mat. It is shipped flat in a protective plastic sleeve.

Other sizes available upon request. Price shown is for single subject. if you would like more than one pet in the portrait, contact me for pricing. Any questions contact Ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Custom Pet Portrait Wine Stopper
description:
This hand painted custom designed wine stopper is the perfect gift for a dog or cat lover. Each stopper is a beautiful & functional piece of art and is one of a kind. 

A pet's name may be added  to the backside by request. Please send a good quality picture to work from or specify a breed. The background will be white unless otherwise specified. Please allow up to 2 weeks for painting and firing. 

Each stopper is signed by the artist and comes in a pretty, organza bag suitable for gift giving and/or hanging on the neck of a wine bottle. 

Upon purchase, you can send a a photo(s) to ruthie@artsmithshop.com

name: Lovers' Tree, Custom Wedding / Engagement / Anniversary Platter
description:
This custom platter features a tree design with a heart including the couple's initials and wedding date. 
Each platter is handpainted and one of a kind. A short personal message can be added to the backside.

Platter is 15x8"
food & oven safe
Handwashing is recommended
